definition: to inspect/to observe and study/on-the-spot investigation
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: Conclusion Tobramycin eye drops is safety for clinic application.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察妥布黴素滴眼液的安全性。

sentences.english: His diving expeditions, which often involved extensive hours at sea, covered some 30 sites in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 他長時間在海中考察，潛水點更多達三十多處。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare praziquantel implants and investigate the in vitro drug release.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備胸腺五肽微球並對其體外釋放進行考察。

sentences.english: The Traditional Institutionalism investigated the history regarding institution as the focus.
sentences.chinese: 傳統制度主義以制度爲中心來考察歷史。

sentences.english: The third part of the study focused on the status of vocational school students bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分集中考察職校生不良行爲習慣的現狀。

sentences.english: Other chapters are available in our e-Library.
sentences.chinese: 在隨後的章節裏，我們將分別考察每一個因素。

sentences.english: This article takes the Longhui Dialect as the example, inspecting its certain dialect word meaning.
sentences.chinese: 文章以隆回方言爲例，考察其若干方言詞義。

sentences.english: Studying primarily conditions for super-fine comminution of rice bran.
sentences.chinese: 初步考察了影響米糠超微細化工藝的因素。

sentences.english: Let's now examine the convolution a bit more as a mathematical entity.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們進一步考察卷積的數學問題。

sentences.english: The development history, teacher and student resources, reform of the education contents and methods, funds and school-house building of the primary education of Henan province were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，主要考察河南省小學教育的發展歷程。

sentences.english: This study probed into the mechanism of cross-language syntactic priming.
sentences.chinese: 本研究考察跨語言句法啓動及其機制。

sentences.english: The induced-flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了黃銅礦和黃鐵礦的誘導浮選行爲。

sentences.english: In this paper we consider a model simulating the ecological" phenomena in a chemostat."
sentences.chinese: 本文考察恆化器模擬生態現象的一類微觀模型。

sentences.english: The release rate of the prepared cream base was investigated by diffusion method.
sentences.chinese: 採用擴散法考察所制乳膏釋放度。

sentences.english: We sat down on the park bench and watched the people as they passed.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐在公園的長凳上，把穩考察着來往的行人。

sentences.english: The third part is the guarantee of the rationality of free proof system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章爲保障自由心證合理性的具體制度考察。

definition: to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
to observe and emulate/to study (esp. following sb's example)
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
